title: MenuSection
description: A sub-grouping of food or drink items in a menu. E.g. courses (such as 'Dinner', 'Breakfast', etc.), specific type of dishes (such as 'Meat', 'Vegan', 'Drinks', etc.), or some other classification made by the menu provider.

allOf.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

hasMenuItem.description: A food or drink item contained in a menu or menu section.

hasMenuSection.description: A subgrouping of the menu (by dishes, course, serving time period, etc.).
